name: Flanders
startIntroPart1: From rich fertile plains to flourishing ports, Flanders emerges as a cultural and economic crossroads at the heart of Unciv. Immerse yourself in an era of artistic and commercial prosperity, where every work of art and every diplomatic agreement shapes your heritage.
startIntroPart2: From thriving trading cities to artistic masterpieces that light up the horizon, Flanders opens the doors to an era of cultural brilliance. As a centre of trade and crafts, you have the chance to shape an unforgettable civilisation in the world of Unciv.
declaringWar: For Flanders and its greatness, we are writing our destiny through conquest and perseverance.
attacked: Our swords are raised, our honour is at stake. Flanders defends its soil with pride and determination.
defeated: Despite our valiant fight, defeat is a bitter pill to swallow, but we will learn from our mistakes and grow stronger.
introduction: Greetings, potential friends. The people of Flanders welcome you with an open mind and mutual interest.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Together, we are sealing a lasting peace agreement, putting an end to the conflicts that have overshadowed our lands. May we move forward into an era of mutual cooperation and prosperity.
tradeRequest: I'm offering you a fruitful trade, where our riches will mingle in a profitable union for both of us.
uniques: [+2 Production, +2 Gold] [in all cities connected to capital]
